## SOFARS

Provide functions to read, analyze and map FARS data

### Reading FARS data
```{r }
library(sofars2)
filename <- system.file("extdata", "accident_2013.csv.bz2", package = "sofars2")
fars_read(filename)
```

### Create a filename for a year
```{r }
library(sofars2)
make_filename(2013)
```

### Read years data
```{r }
library(sofars2)
fars_read_years(2013)
```
